title: >>> Welcome "BACK"
body_text:
The news all have been waiting for is finally here.
This coming Friday at Diana's party will be the official public viewing of the new dodgeball documentary, "Not JUST a Game".
The behind the scenes story comes from one man, Dan Spengeman. This documentary was produced, edited, narrated, [etc] by Dan himself, which is the sole reason why he arrived late to DODGEBALL XXIV. He worked on it for 20 hours straight beginning from last Friday afternoon and concluding around midday Saturday.
The documentary itself is said to be outstanding, and very professionally done. Interviews, action, comedy, and more are compiled into this 45 minute DVD. It is a must watch for anyone associated with dodgeball, past or present.
"Diana's Dodgeball Dinner" just got a hell of lot better. What better way to start DODGEBALL XXV weekend than with a "pasta party" and a viewing of the first dodgeball documentary ever made.
This is definitely "Not JUST a Game".
body_html:
The news all have been waiting for is finally here.

This coming Friday at Diana's party will be the official public viewing of the new dodgeball documentary, "Not JUST a Game".

The behind the scenes story comes from one man, Dan Spengeman. This documentary was produced, edited, narrated, [etc] by Dan himself, which is the sole reason why he arrived late to DODGEBALL XXIV. He worked on it for 20 hours straight beginning from last Friday afternoon and concluding around midday Saturday.

The documentary itself is said to be outstanding, and very professionally done. Interviews, action, comedy, and more are compiled into this 45 minute DVD. It is a must watch for anyone associated with dodgeball, past or present.

"Diana's Dodgeball Dinner" just got a hell of lot better. What better way to start DODGEBALL XXV weekend than with a "pasta party" and a viewing of the first dodgeball documentary ever made.

This is definitely "Not JUST a Game".
